name: DeckGenius: Presentation Studio
description:
A next-generation presentation platform that bridges creativity and data.
It allows users to design, present, and automate visual content with ease.
Beyond traditional slide editing, it introduces dynamic data binding, intelligent chart generation, and bulk slide creation directly from structured data sources â€” combining the freedom of design with the power of automation.
The system reimagines modern presentation tools like Google Slides, turning them into interactive, data-driven storytelling engines.
